ingredients: 1  lemon, thinly sliced, 4 sprigs fresh rosemary, 2  salmon fillets, bones and skin removed,   coarse salt to taste, 1 tablespoon olive oil, or as needed
nutrition: Total Fat 18g 23%, Saturated Fat 3g 16%, Cholesterol 56mg 19%, Sodium 1017mg 44%, Total Carbohydrate 6g 2%, Dietary Fiber 3g 10%, Protein 21g, Vitamin C 45mg 226%, Calcium 51mg 4%, Iron 1mg 4%, Potassium 431mg 9%
